Articles.Content:
Infernal Robotics with some extra addons, trying to get the engines to attach, but they are refusing too. Have tweaked the engine size with TweakScale as well.

Any suggestions?
The issue is that your other engines are clipping, you should try attaching them without symmetry, or only build 1 complete arm, and then use symmetry to duplicate.
Sigh, but of course. Need to give that a go. Thanks!
